Articles.Content:
I repair the toilet and flush it, I also build a sewage filled moat around it.

My toilet with a moat.

THe toilet has exploded.

Also, I send ninja death stars to track you down and kill you.

They found you AGAIN.

My planetary rubble.

I send a fleet of recovery ships to bring the piece of rubble with the toilet on it to Jool.

My chunk of Duna with a exploded toilet and a sewer orbiting Jool.

I make a landship with a tiny hill inside of it that is all of about -5+10 inches high. my hill inside of this:

 ![images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS86vwzItdZfGILqqXsSAYZymaiC46A0JUjOGOPGJ555Qe2mFNm](https://encrypted-tbn2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS86vwzItdZfGILqqXsSAYZymaiC46A0JUjOGOPGJ555Qe2mFNm)

Dark Junior has destroyed Duna. The force of the explosion causes Ike to crash into Eve. I still have a hill on Ike.

My hill.

(We're still allies, right, Generalstarwars333?)

I send a ninja death star to blow up the landship and eve. I make a hill out of the rubble.

My hill.

The *HMS Ninja Death Star* has blasted the other side of Eve, and Ike has been flung out into Kerbol orbit.

My hill.

(Also, Dark Junior has now annihilated 2 major planets.)

I punch PineCone off his hill.

My hill.

I throw a large boulder at you (there's low gravity on Ike) and knock you into the moat that I built around the hill. (What? You thought I wouldn't have defences?)

My hill.

I kick you off the hill.

My hill.

I dig a deep hole near the hill, and throw you into it.

My hill.

I send the ninja death stars to wipe out the entire kerbol system, and blow up kerbol with the Sun Crusher.

My remnant of a solar system.

I slap you off, go to Kerbol, and build hill on Laythe.

My hill.

> 
> I send the ninja death stars to wipe out the entire kerbol system, and blow up kerbol with the Sun Crusher.
> My remnant of a solar system.

> 
> I slap you off, go to Kerbol, and build hill on Laythe.
> My hill.

How can you go to Kerbol when it does not exist anymore?

- - - Updated - - -

Also, I press Ctl+Alt+Del and restart the universe, making all hills indestructible and mine, of course.

> 
> Also, I press Ctl+Alt+Del and restart the universe, making all hills indestructible and mine, of course.

So, you make all the hills in the universe yours.

What about ones that people build?

I build a underground base with a hill in it.

My base with a hill.

I use a driller and bust your base.

My hill.

I call the guards to come and eject you from the base.

Also, I fill in the hole that Yukon0009 drilled in it.

My hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-01T13:05:46Z" title="11/01/2015 01:05  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 1, 2015</time> by PineCone**

I push all incarnations of PineCone off the hills.

My hill.

> 
> Dark Junior has destroyed Duna. The force of the explosion causes Ike to crash into Eve. I still have a hill on Ike.
> My hill.
> 
> (We're still allies, right, Generalstarwars333?)

 Yep we're still allies. I still have this: 
![images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS86vwzItdZfGILqqXsSAYZymaiC46A0JUjOGOPGJ555Qe2mFNm](https://encrypted-tbn2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS86vwzItdZfGILqqXsSAYZymaiC46A0JUjOGOPGJ555Qe2mFNm) With a little place with a tiny -5+7 inch hill inside of it. I can give you your own hill inside of this landship if you want: 

![images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRsz11ZseBKvdOgiElUGwn_Pmd82HNU7hKf4x5jn4FNrpfcNyM1](https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRsz11ZseBKvdOgiElUGwn_Pmd82HNU7hKf4x5jn4FNrpfcNyM1)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-01T15:03:45Z" title="11/01/2015 03:03  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 1, 2015</time> by Generalstarwars333**

I thank Generalstarwars333 and build a hill inside the landship.

My hill.

I also build the next poster a hill, so that he/she won't try to take mine.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-01T18:08:23Z" title="11/01/2015 06:08  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 1, 2015</time> by PineCone**
yayzlez!

I build a hill on Tekto.  

My Tekto hill.
I send an ambassador to your hill asking if You'll join my alliance.

I claim a hill.  

My hill.

i use your mega uzi math on your hill  

A hill, some math, a mega uzi
